lead_paragraph: The tale of an illicit school relationship took a shocking turn on Tuesday when Isaac Duran Infante was charged with two counts of murder in the deaths of Felicia Barahona and their 4-year-old son.

byline.contributor: Eli Rosenberg and Noah Remnick contributed reporting. Alain Delaquérière contributed research.
byline.original: By JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN and AL BAKER

headline.print_headline: Former Student Charged With Murder in Killings of Ex-Teacher and Their Son
headline.main: Former Student Is Charged in Killings of Ex-Teacher and Their Son

snippet: The tale of an illicit school relationship took a shocking turn on Tuesday when Isaac Duran Infante was charged with two counts of murder in the deaths of Felicia Barahona and their 4-year-old son....
abstract: New York Police Dept announces that Isaac Duran Infante has been charged with first-degree murder in deaths of Bronx woman Felicia Barahona and their son, Miguel Barahona; Duran Infante and Barahona were subject of minor tabloid scandal when they were caught in 2012 having sexual relationship while she was his teacher in high school.
